stories.text: I'm graduating next year as SE and I got an offer from IBM, and since Covid I just see Senior jobs openings, increasingly in the last two years. Why is that? I wonder are big companies still hiring recent graduates? Where should I look at?
stories.title: Ask HN: What big companies (really) hire recent graduates?
Will Apple be the last US tech giant left in China?

stories.text:
Has anyone else faced this situation?
1. Your account gets locked due to "unusual activity".
2. You try to follow the process to unlocking it via SMS verification.
3. You receive a text with an unlock code.
4. Attempting to use the unlock code within 15 seconds of receiving it - either via copying and pasting, or entering it by typing in the numbers fails because the code is "incorrect or expired".
stories.title: Facebook's SMS account unlocker is not functioning
In defense of “Q-plasma” – a response to Sabine Hossenfelder
